thread.title: AMD Ryzen release date, specs and features
thread.title_full: AMD Ryzen release date, specs and features

author: Jim Martin
title: AMD Ryzen release date, specs and features
text: AMD Ryzen release date, specifications and features : Three CPUs from the Ryzen 7 range now available to pre-order AMD Ryzen release date, specs and features In recent years Intel has been pulling away from AMD's processors, with most people - including gamers - choosing the Intel-based CPUs for their machines. AMD is looking to change that in 2017, with its new Ryzen processors. Here's everything you need to know about the new Ryzen CPUs, including specifications and prices. AMD's new Ryzen processor could steal the performance crown from Intel - at half the price
